left.text: This young lady from Riverdale, GA was heavily involved in witchcraft. A young person gave her a Truth For Youth Bible. As a result of the power of God's Word she gave her life to Jesus Christ!

right.text: I owe my life to Jesus!

left.text: Andrea Gautier in Marksville, LA took THE TRUTH FOR YOUTH Bible to her history class. Her curious teacher examined the Bible thoroughly. The teacher then requested 23 TRUTH FOR YOUTH Bibles.

right.text: One for everyone in the class!

left.text: This young man from Columbus, GA received a Truth For Youth Bible, read the comic on Rock Music, went home and threw all of his "Spice Girl" posters and CD's in the trash!
